children.name: Extend ACA tax credit

children.name: CDCTC permanent

children.name: Childcare
children.desc: Make child care affordable, invest in high-quality care, and fund training for child care providers

children.name: Paid leave
children.desc: Create a national comprehensive paid family and medical leave program

children.name: Expand EBT
children.desc: Expand summer EBT to all eligible children nationwide

children.name: Free meals
children.desc: Expand free meals for children in the highest poverty districts

children.name: Free universal Pre-K
children.desc: Free, universal pre-kindergarten for all three- and four-year-olds

children.name: Pell grants
children.desc: Increase Pell Grants for low-income students

children.name: College completion
children.desc: Invest in evidence-based strategies to strengthen completion and retention rates at community colleges and institutions that serve students from our most disadvantaged communities

children.desc: Provide two years of subsidized tuition for students from families earning less than $125,000 enrolled in a four-year HBCU, TCU, or MSI

children.name: Nutrition
